attributes.action: Stop firework sale to the public and home use, pets and animals are suffering
attributes.additional_details:
Pets are terrified and it’s not humane for us to put them through this each year
Understandably people want to see the dazzling show of a display of fireworks which is fine, however this can be achieved at a public display without distressing and mentally scaring pets and animals to where there quivering in their homes and being sick through pure fright, and cannot be consoled as they don’t understand.
attributes.background:
Make the use of fireworks banned for public sale and only be available to organised professionals on Bon fire night 
For a public display only

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
